name.ja: <ruby>超<rt>ちょう</rt></ruby><ruby>越<rt>えつ</rt></ruby><ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby>メテオロス

text.en: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by card effect. You can only use each of the following effects of "Transcendrake Meteoros" once per turn. During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can destroy 2 other Dinosaur monsters you control and/or in your hand, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned: You can send 1 Dinosaur monster from your Deck to the GY. If this card is destroyed: You can shuffle 1 Normal Monster from your GY into the Deck, then you can Special Summon this card.
